name: releases/cpp/v2.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add note about vckpg port by @james-rms in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1451
* cpp: build with both clang & gcc in CI by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1464
* cpp: enable & fix -Wshadow for GCC by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1465
* cpp: bump version to 2.1.1 by @jtbandes in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1466

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/compare/releases/cpp/v2.1.0...releases/cpp/v2.1.1

* (https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1453) Fixed a bug in mcap doctor which would raise an error for schemaless channels.

name: releases/mcap-cli/v0.0.54
body:
## Changelog

### New
- (#1352) `mcap doctor` now reports an error for any strings in records that are not valid UTF-8.
- (#1425) `mcap info` now reports information about chunks that overlap in time range. Thanks @wkalt for your contribution!
- (#1372) `mcap recover` is not significantly faster in the common case where an MCAP is truncated. Thanks @mrkbac for your contribution!

### Fixed
- fix iteration edge case with overlapping chunks (#1385)
- reader: do not report full byte array for UnexpectedTokenError (#1365)
- https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1423
- https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1423

name: releases/rust/v0.23.1
body:

name: releases/cpp/v2.0.1
body:
## Fixed
* Add missing cstdint include (gcc15 build failure) by @oysstu in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1371

name: releases/mcap-cli/v0.0.53
body:
## Fixed
- Fixed a bug in `mcap merge` channel auto-coalescing behavior, where sometimes identical channels in input files would not result in one output channel.

name: releases/rust/v0.16.0
body:
## Breaking Changes

The `LinearReader` in the `sans_io` module had multiple breaking changes in #1341. To fix:

- rename `mcap::sans_io::read` to `mcap::sans_io::linear_reader`.
- rename `mcap::sans_io::read::ReadAction` to `mcap::sans_io::linear_reader::LinearReadEvent`
- rename `LinearReader::next_action()` to `LinearReader::next_event()`
- rename `LinearReader::set_written()` to `LinearReader::notify_read()`
- rename `mcap::tokio::read::RecordReader` to `mcap::tokio::linear_reader::LinearReader`


## What's Changed
* rust: rename items in linear reader by @james-rms in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1341
* Optimize LinearReader::next_record by @eloff in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1346
* replace `memmap` with `memmap2` by @eric-seppanen in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1350
* upgrade to zstd 0.13 by @eric-seppanen in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1349
* rust: make Writer::with_options pub by @bennetthardwick in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1351

## New Contributors

* @eloff made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1346
* @eric-seppanen made their first contribution in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1350

body:
## What's Changed
* python: remove unused buffer by @syundo0730 in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1287
* Update docs to match exclusive end_time implementation by @rdumas01 in https://github.com/foxglove/mcap/pull/1286

name: releases/mcap-cli/v0.0.49
body:
## Added
- Added the `du` subcommand to analyze MCAP files for disk usage statistics.
- `filter`: Added `--start` and `--end` arguments that accept either nanosecond or RFC3339-formatted log times.
- `add attachment`: `--log-time` argument now accepts RFC3339-formatted timestamps.
